photoURL.description: URL of the user's profile picture.

Follow.title: Follow Relationship
Follow.description: Represents a follow relationship between two users.

SavedMovie.title: Saved Movie
SavedMovie.description: Represents a movie saved by a user.

UserMovieRating.title: User Movie Rating
UserMovieRating.description: Represents a rating given by a user to a movie.

rating.description: The rating given by the user (e.g., 1-10).

UserReview.title: User Movie Review
UserReview.description: A review for a movie written by a user.

userId.description: The ID of the user who wrote the review.

displayName.description: The display name of the user.

photoURL.description: The profile picture URL of the user.

content.description: The text content of the review.

createdAt.description: The timestamp when the review was created.

rating.description: The rating given along with the review.

WatchParty.title: Watch Party
WatchParty.description: Represents a scheduled watch party for a specific movie.

movieId.description: The ID of the movie for the watch party.

moviePosterPath.description: The poster path of the movie.

scheduledAt.description: The scheduled date and time of the watch party.

hostId.description: The UID of the user hosting the party.

hostDisplayName.description: The display name of the host.

hostPhotoURL.description: The profile picture URL of the host.

Rsvp.title: RSVP
Rsvp.description: Represents a user's RSVP to a watch party.

ChatMessage.title: Chat Message
ChatMessage.description: Represents a single message in a watch party chat.

/users/{userId}/savedMovies/{movieId}.description: Sub-collection storing movies saved by a user.

/users/{userId}/following/{followedUserI.description: Sub-collection storing users that this user is following.

/users/{userId}/followers/{followerUserI.description: Sub-collection storing users that are following this user.

/users/{userId}/ratings/{movieId}.description: Sub-collection storing a user's movie ratings.

/movies/{movieId}/reviews/{reviewId}.description: Sub-collection storing all user reviews for a specific movie.

/watch-parties/{partyId}.description: A collection of all scheduled watch parties.

/watch-parties/{partyId}/rsvps/{userId}.description: A sub-collection storing all users who have RSVP'd to a party.

/watch-parties/{partyId}/messages/{messa.description: A sub-collection for storing live chat messages for a party.
